list.name: Compute Manifest Start
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
  extract(epoch from time_column) AS time,
  text_column as text,
  tags_column as tags
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

list.name: Compute Manifest End
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
  extract(epoch from time_column) AS time,
  text_column as text,
  tags_column as tags
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

list.name: State Sync Start
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
  extract(epoch from time_column) AS time,
  text_column as text,
  tags_column as tags
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

list.name: State Sync End
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
  extract(epoch from time_column) AS time,
  text_column as text,
  tags_column as tags
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

description: IC / Testnet health overview, with filtering drill-down links to detail dashboards

panels.description:
Finalized, max resident, certified and min resident heights, per replica.

Plus finalization rate (blocks / second) per instance, averaged over **$period**.
panels.title: State Range

panels.description: Subnet messages inducted per second by  status, averaged over **$period**.
panels.title: Message Induction Rate

panels.description: Sum of per-subnet median messages enqueued in incoming queues (above zero) and outgoing streams (below).
panels.title: Enqueued Messages

panels.description: Median messages executed per second by message type, averaged over **$period**
panels.title: Message Execution Rate, by Type

panels.description: HTTP requests per second across all instances, by type and status, averaged over **$period**
panels.title: HTTP Request Rate, by Type and Status

panels.description: Gossip median received unvalidated bytes (above zero, left Y axis) and artifacts (below, right Y axis) across instances by pool, averaged over **$period**
panels.title: Gossip Received

panels.description: CPU time spent in `on_state_change()` by subcomponent, averaged over **$period**.
panels.title: Consensus CPU Usage

panels.description: Total P2P transport flows across instances, by state. In steady state, all transport flows should be in state *Connected*.
panels.title: Transport Flows, by State

panels.description: Mean RX/TX packets and bytes, across nodes.
panels.title: Mean Node Network Traffic

panels.description: Mean node CPU mode (all processes), across all instances.
panels.title: Mean Node CPU Mode

panels.description: Mean validation duration by artifact type on $instance, averaged over **$period**.
panels.title: Mean Validation Duration, by Artifact Type - $instance

panels.description: Rate of non-empty change sets returned by `on_state_change()` by subcomponent, averaged over **$period**.
panels.title: Non-Empty Change Sets

panels.description: Rate of `on_state_change()` invocations on $instance, averaged over **$period**.
panels.title: `on_state_change()` Sub-Component Invocations

panels.description: Mean change set size returned by each sub-component on $instance, averaged over **$period**.
panels.title: Mean Change Set Size, by Sub-Component

title: Replicas SxS
